title: Taiwan EFL Secondary Learners' Interaction Competency Enhancement Program via Videoconferencing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English conversation skills and understanding of mathematical terminology
context.additional_context: VR simulation environment development for explaining mathematics curriculum content in English, with real-time interaction opportunities with native speakers via video conferencing

learning_goals: Learners can use VR simulations to explain math problem-solving processes in English with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can appropriately utilize over 50 math-related vocabulary items in context-specific situations during conversations with native speakers via video conferencing.
Learners achieve a 30% improvement in their English communication confidence index through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
